metadata.title: CVE-2023-2069 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from10.0 before 12.9.8, all versions starting from 12.10 before 12.10.7, allversions starting from 13.0 before 13.0.1. A user with the role ofdeveloper could use the import project feature to leak CI/CD variables.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
